actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Thursday, March 2, 2023,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Thursday, March 2, 2023, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN27:
        Daniel I. Werfel, of the District of Columbia, to be Commissioner of Internal Revenue for the term expiring November 12, 2027

        -- Motion to proceed to executive session to consideration of nomination agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

        -- Cloture motion presented in Senate.

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, mandatory quorum required under Rule XXII waived.


 PN166:
        Robert Stewart Ballou, of Virginia, to be United States District Judge for the Western District of Virginia

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 35. Record Vote Number: 40 


        -- By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote 3/7/2023.
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Schumer, at  6:43 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
